name: Sins of the Guardian
description:
Sins of the Guardian is a third person action/adventure puzzle platformer game. The player takes control of a guardian of worlds, keeping peace and quelling conflict throughout the lands. Corruption has spread and disrupted the balance, twisting the lands and their inhabitants against their will. Using the power of sin contained in seven masks, the player must travel the lands, and cleanse the corruption to restore balance.

Solve puzzles, string together abilities, avoid combat, cleanse the lands and the beast at the core to return the world to order.
